name: The Dreamweaver's Journal
description: A tattered and torn leather-bound journal now lies amidst the overgrown weeds and broken flowerbeds, its pages scattered with notes and sketches of a once beautiful garden, now ravaged and destroyed. The entries speak of a descent into excess and consumption, as if the very act of recording the garden's beauty had become an exercise in self-indulgence, mirroring the player's own gluttony.

name: The Dreaming Tear
description: A dusty and slightly-smudged vial now reflects a swirling vortex of irate bees and their sharp, anxious stingers, as if the surrounding chaos has seared itself into its crystalline depths.
